column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Pema says : " Tenzin , are you sure you ca n't go with them ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Raiko asked me to stay here and help figure out a diplomatic solution to this Kuvira problem . "
#Text=Ikki says : " Mom , we 'll be fine .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Mom , we 're going to be out in the wild , living off the land !
#Text=We do n't need your food !
#Text=" Pema says : " But I made your favorite treat ... " Meelo says : " Sweet buns with happy faces on them ?
#Text=Well , I guess we 're not officially on the road yet .
#Text=Aww , this one is smudged .
#Text=I ca n't eat this .
#Text=" Pema says : " You know , sometimes things get smudged in the wild .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We 're you able to get a read on Korra yet ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " No , but once we 're further out , I 'll be able to hone in on her spiritual energy .
#Text=We should be able to find her within a few days .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Good luck !
#Text=And be careful !
#Text=Remember , Jinora 's in charge !
#Text=" Meelo says : " I answer to no man .
#Text=Or girl , even if she does have tattoos .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Meelo ... " Meelo says : " Now let 's move out , soldiers !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Ugh ... Pepper , yip - yip !
#Text="
